transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What day is this? ... My hood is squeezing me. It's hot in here! ... How many more shows do I have to do? ... [sip] Even God rested... Maybe we need to start repeating shows... Tell me a joke.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: All right, this guy walks into -

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Okay. A guy walks... All right, wait... Okay... Okay... All right... Wait...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Smell the burning flesh.Taste the tangy sulfur air.Volcano season.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Mantis green and strong.Deadly pincers, razor sharp. (sips coffee)Waiting for his chance.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ehhhh, floating asteroid,Eh, need to buy some school supplies,Ehh, you're soaking in it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Har de har. I don't do a monologue, junior.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Tonight you do. Haven't you read the script?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes, of course I read the script! I just don't remember... I'm under a lot of pressure, you know... I'm a workin' man, I don't have time for scripts! ... You know!

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: Hey! Live! The Space Ghost! Coast to Coast! Live! The Space Ghost! Hey! Coast to Coast! Live! Hey!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Good evening! I'm Space Ghost! On my show tonight, body slammer Hulk Hogan, and straight from the snake pit, Slash! Now, please say hello to my band, Zorak and The Original Way Outs!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (reading from a cue card held up by the guitarist; very badly read) Say Zorak, A.. funny thing.. happened.. to me.. on the way.. to the studio! Tonight! (laughs hysterically)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I was there. Nothing was funny.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (under his breath) Come on! Quit it!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I said, a funny thing happened to me.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: No it di- (Space Ghost motions towards his power bands) - eheh!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Say! I just invisoed in from the coast, and boy are my arms tired!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, buddy. They're tired. (coughs) Hey! You know what's crazy? I'll tell you! Politics! Those guys running around voting, making laws and stuff. I mean, who asked them? (laughs, then starts coughing) Hey, aren't... (more coughing) Phfwhew! Pollen!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You're playing with fire, greeny, so play me to the desk!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Uhh, I would prefer not to.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: That's the way it is. I ain't doin' it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You're not a scrivener. You're a locust. So play me to the desk!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (plays Space Ghost to the desk with funeral pipe organ music)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Greetings, Hulkster! Are you getting enough O2?

transcript.speaker: Hulk Hogan
transcript.dialogue: oh, solisdael oll benagoltyl do panino..

transcript.speaker: Hulk Hogan
transcript.dialogue: Yeah! Me and that little bee!

transcript.speaker: Hulk Hogan
transcript.dialogue: (showing belt) The belt's there because, um, I didn't want any of those space aliens to steal it..

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, I don't think the Hulkster's getting enough oxygen.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (in control room) Umm, uh, where are we, page six?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hang on, Hulkster, we're working on it!

transcript.speaker: Hulk Hogan
transcript.dialogue: Five miles of Cuban waters. Mark.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Now what's the inflation on this exactly?

transcript.speaker: Hulk Hogan
transcript.dialogue: Does anyone really care what time it is?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: All right, hang on, now what in the.. (pulls lever) there!

transcript.speaker: Hulk Hogan
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost! The man with the beef!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (to Moltar) Don't tell me it's ok if it's not ok!

transcript.speaker: Hulk Hogan
transcript.dialogue: I know now that I'm on Space Ghost's new show.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Alrighty. Hulk, you have an identifying theme that is cloaked in clandestine mystery! Care to divulge it?

transcript.speaker: Hulk Hogan
transcript.dialogue: (to Moltar) Whatcha gonna do, when Hulk Hogan comes to wrestle you?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Come on! What's your secret identity?

transcript.speaker: Hulk Hogan
transcript.dialogue: My true identity is the leader of the pack.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Don't you know that I'll always be true, yeah, in-a-gadda-da-vida, Zorak... You know, Hulkie, in some ways, you and Zorak are a lot alike!

transcript.speaker: Hulk Hogan
transcript.dialogue: No! He's got different colored skin! I'm tanned! I'm from California-

transcript.speaker: Hulk Hogan
transcript.dialogue: And I'm the WCW heavyweight champion! That other guy's just a cartoon character!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey! What do you mean, 'just a cartoon character'?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, what's that supposed to mean?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Look, I paid my dues! I waited tables! I answered phones!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I polished silver for the queen.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Me and Rubelle! Man, we could really... Hey! What do you think of Lassie, Hulk?

transcript.speaker: Hulk Hogan
transcript.dialogue: Well, I'm a, I'm a animal lover; I don't think I'd really wanna -

transcript.speaker: Hulk Hogan
transcript.dialogue: - wrestle Lassie, I wish Lassie was my pet.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Me too... But Ted Turner won't let us have pets in the studio. Ever since Banjo... BANNNNJOOOOOOO!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ted owns us, Zorak; he can push us around. Even you, Hulk.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What if Ted made you do Xeroxing all day? In an apron! Would you piledrive him?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You would, wouldn't ya? 'Cause you're a tough guy! You're Mr. Tough!

transcript.speaker: Hulk Hogan
transcript.dialogue: He's got pretty big arms the last time I saw him, because he's been working out with his wife, Jane Fonda.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey! I don't have a nose!

transcript.speaker: Hulk Hogan
transcript.dialogue: Who's the most powerful man in the Turner organization?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Uhh... I would say Ted.... Ted... Then Space Ghost -

transcript.speaker: Hulk Hogan
transcript.dialogue: I'd love to see if I could body-slam that big dude.

transcript.speaker: Hulk Hogan
transcript.dialogue: (gives Space Ghost a nice biceps shot)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (returns biceps shots) Whoa daddy! .. Back atcha! .. Heyy bobbaroni!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (to Space Ghost) Originally, they used to say, "Couples skate next - two girls may not skate together." And then like a couple years later they'd say, "Couples skate - two girls may not skate together. Two boys may not skate together." But they'd say it like, "Who'd've figured! Two boys may not skate together?!"

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: How do you do! How do you do, ladies and gentleman! We're home! Later in the program, we'll be talking to a nice gentleman named Slash! Ow! Ow! I've thrown my back out! Worker's comp! Aahhh! (laughs) Had you going. Hey Hulk, do you know Slash's last name?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Dondi didn't have a last name either! Neither did Henry! He didn't even have a mouth!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: What about her, eh? A word that has no S's that's full of 'em. Xuxa! Xuxa! Xuxa! Ohhhh, Xuxa! Xuxa! Xuxa! (keeps saying "Xuxa" in background)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (to Hulk) Will you come over and put the sleeper on Zorak?

transcript.speaker: Hulk Hogan
transcript.dialogue: I don't think any of us, anybody like you, or any of the little Space Ghost kids out there, all those fans of yours, should ever try any wrestlin' holds at home.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (imitating Hulk) Ohh! You should never put the, sleeper hold, on your boys and, your little girlfriends, and buhh. (normal voice) Ok, Hulk, whatever.

transcript.speaker: Hulk Hogan
transcript.dialogue: Well, it looks like you've been eating those space cheeseburgers; I'm looking at your waist, and that belly of yours is hanging out so far, I don't even think you can see your shoelaces when you tie your space tennis boots!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: My laces are Velcro. (condescending) So tell us! What's new in the incredible world of Hulk?

transcript.speaker: Hulk Hogan
transcript.dialogue: A brand new TV series called "Thunder in Paradise," where I get to play an action-adventure hero on TV every week!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sarcastic) An action-adventure hero! Woooooo! Why didn't I think of that? And you fight crime, right? That's original! Hey, do you beat up any bad guys? Maybe come to the rescue of a few distressed citizens?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sure! Maybe even save the day while you're at it!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Been there, done that, see ya! (turns off Hulk) Moltar, give him a copy of the home game! Please welcome my next guest, Slash!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, I'm Space Ghost. I'm the host; you just answer my questions!

transcript.speaker: Slash
transcript.dialogue: Then you'd probably ask me a question I couldn't answer, I'd feel like a real idiot.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, no no. Don't you worry your pretty little head about anything.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay. Citizen Slash, welcome to the show! You're from earth, right?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: How many clouds does earth have?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You know, son, if you were a paramedic people'd be dead already.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Citizen Longhair, when you're on tour, do you ever miss your mommy?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Are you even listening to me?

transcript.speaker: Slash
transcript.dialogue: I'm here, I just said yeah!

transcript.speaker: Slash
transcript.dialogue: I can't do this, you guys; I knew this before we got here.

transcript.speaker: Slash
transcript.dialogue: Get me out of here, I'm just.. (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sing us a zippy guitar riff with your mouth.

transcript.speaker: Slash
transcript.dialogue: No, no, just listen to the record, I have no intentions of doing any zippy guitar riffs with my mou-

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No, this. Daooo daooo dao dao daooo..

transcript.speaker: Slash
transcript.dialogue: I'm not gonna cooperate with you, I don't have to.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You know what, Slash? We'll be right back. (flies off)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, Slash! But don't worry buddy, we'll be right back! (evil laugh)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: See ya in a sec, Slash, baby. (all snicker)
